column1: 0$Condition: Other$7/29/2014 6:44:27 PM$Reviewer: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver) $1$1$1$"Almost immediate onset of severe tremors (Parkinson-like)which have not subsided in 3 years.  He is almost unable to eat unassisted at times.  This was piled onto my bipolar spouse's regimen while also on lithium
column2: Depakote and diabetes meds.  He was successfully coming down from a Manic episode when this was added (unnecessarily
column3: I believe).  I WOULD NOT GIVE THIS MED TO A RABID DOG
column4: MUCH LESS A HUMAN BEING.  We also believe he experienced extreme
column5: rapid muscle loss after taking this poison.

column1: Sorry.  It may help some people but NOT us
column2: and I would not recommend it for bipolar psychosis. "

column1: 1$Condition: Other$6/7/2013 5:23:56 PM$Reviewer:  (Patient) $4$1$1$I have Bipolar I Disorder with psychosis
column2: it keeps the psychosis at bay. I'm no longer in an episode so there is no need for me to be taking it. I am required to however
column3: I feel tired all the time

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $4$4$4$I have been diagnosed with fibromyalgia.  My Dr. prescribed Invega 3 mg pills along with an anti-depressant to assist with pain management.  I was extremely skeptical when I read what Invega was designed to treat
column3: but at the time I was in so much pain I was desperate to try anything. Strangely enough it has helped!   I'm not 100%
column4: but I am able to work.

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $5$4$3$I went through a period of sycosis from end of January 2011 - March or April 2011. Started getting the shot in March I think and in a month or 2 the sycosis subsided. Been on it now for almost a year and haven't heard any voices that aren't really there or seen anything that isn't really there. This was probally my 5th time having sycosis. This time I was diagnosed with schizoaffective disorder. I haven't really noticed any side effects. Except for I had lost some wieght then gained 20 lbs back and I am making alot of the hormone that you have when you are pregnant but am not pregnant. That causes me to produce milk. When I first started getting the shot I was scared. Getting the shot in the arm hurts for a few days afterward. The hip doesn't really hurt at all.
45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $4$4$3$My experience with this drug has been short
column3: but in that time I have found it to and effective option when the oral medication fails to alleviate the symptoms of schizoaffective disorder
column4: symptoms in particular audio and visual hallucinations.
